amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that NASA should not dilute, distort, suppress, or impede scientific research or the dissemination thereof.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 110-707 to express the sense of Congress that NASA should not dilute, distort, suppress, or impede scientific research or the dissemination thereof.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wu amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
